text:
May Blood, Baroness Blood, MBE (born 26 May 1938) is a Labour politician. She is a member of the British House of Lords. She was born and raised in Belfast.
Since 1994, she has been an Information Officer of the [http://www.greatershankillpartnership.org Greater Shankill Partnership] and is a founding member of the Northern Ireland Women's Coalition. She was appointed a Member of the Order of the British Empire (MBE) in the 1995 Birthday Honours.

annotations.surface_form: Member of the Order of the British Empire
